sentences.en: " From many of the nobles, requesting that his art Lend a new lustre to their screens. "
sentences.cn: 贵戚权门得 笔迹,始觉屏障生光辉.

sentences.en: A writeback cache for Lustre metadata servers is also being considered.
sentences.cn: Lustre元数据服务器的回写缓存也被纳入考虑.

sentences.en: But I console myself with the lustre it's already bringing to our practice.
sentences.cn: 不过,能安慰我的是,我们的事业因之灿然生辉.

sentences.en: Her hair had lost its lustre.
Her thick, black hair shone with lustre.
sentences.cn: 她那一头乌黑浓密的秀发闪动着光泽。

sentences.en: His plans were bold and fiery, and his conceptions glowed with barbaric lustre.
sentences.cn: 他的设计豪放不羁, 他的主意如同迸射出的犷悍的火花.

sentences.en: His son's success added lustre to his name.
sentences.cn: 儿子的成功使他的名声大增.

sentences.en: Inside was a green paste, waxy in lustre, the odour curiously heavy and persistent.
sentences.cn: 里边是一种绿色的软膏, 有蜡质的光泽, 气味浓郁,而且经久不散.

sentences.en: It is softer than cotton and nylon and has a similar lustre to silk.
sentences.cn: 它较棉布和尼龙柔软，光泽则与丝绸相仿。

sentences.en: It was certainly a doubtful charm, imparting a hard, metallic lustre to the child's character.
sentences.cn: 这种活力在孩子的性格上增加了一种坚硬的金属般的光泽,其魅力甚属可疑.

sentences.en: Lustre is the integral effect of reflection and diffraction.
sentences.cn: 色泽是反射和衍射的综合效果.

sentences.en: Lustre provides several basic, command - line oriented utilities for initial configuration and administration.
sentences.cn: Lustre提供了初始化配置和管理的几个基本的面向命令行的工具.

sentences.en: The silver lustre of the maid sicklied the poor widow.
sentences.cn: 那位姑娘的银白色光泽既象闪电一样使那位可怜的寡妇黯然失色.

sentences.en: They gave a lack - lustre performance.
What do you do if your relationship is beginning to lose its lustre?
sentences.cn: 如果你们的关系开始失去情趣，你会怎么办？
